{{cpp/title|swap{{small|(std::any)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/any/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=any|since=c++17|
void swap( any&amp; lhs, any&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}

Overloads the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::any}}. Swaps the content of two {{tt|any}} objects by calling {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|objects to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;any&gt;
#include &lt;print&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;

int main()
{
    std::any p = 42, q = std::string{"Bishop"};
    std::println("p: {}, q: {}", std::any_cast&lt;int&gt;(p), std::any_cast&lt;std::string&amp;&gt;(q));
    std::println("swap(p, q)");
    std::swap(p, q);
    std::println("p: {}, q: {}", std::any_cast&lt;std::string&amp;&gt;(p), std::any_cast&lt;int&gt;(q));
}
|output=
p: 42, q: Bishop
swap(p, q)
p: Bishop, q: 42
}}
